name: Surface The Pixel Game
description:
Surface The Pixel Game is a Pixel Art Game based on Android. Surface the Pixel Game tells about "Faro and Melati". Who is "Faro and Melati"?. They are Protagonist character in this case. Which is they have some enemy called "Girlzo". Girlzo is antagonist character and it's really hate to Faro and Melati, because she want to kills and spoil the peace to Faro and Melati.  Synopsis:

Let's explore and explore the world of the internet! Wow.Web engine with the main characters: Melati and Faro,  to fight the internet's biggest enemy, namely a trojan-like virus (Girlzo) that tries to attack internet network security and manipulate the world to become chaotic and destroyed. Can you? Jasmine and Faro stop Girlzo virus and other viruses?, let's adventure.

The Main reason to upload this is for task and learn for coding cuz it's still struggle too, etc. Thx ^^, btw i give the apk file for test on your Android. Any suggestions it's really appreciate!
